channel.title: Printers on Gregg's MOTD
channel.description: Recent content in Printers on Gregg's MOTD

item.title: Install Epson ET-3850 Printer Driver on Slackware 15.0
item.description: I recently bought an Epson ET-3850 printer from Costco to replace my HP OfficeJet which was about 10 years old and the family was starting to have issues with establishing a wi-fi connection to it on their Windoze laptops. It took quite a while to setup. The Epson seems to be doing the job. Time will tell, however I discovered that setting it up for Slackware would also take a bit of effort. Drivers are only available on the Epson website in RPM or DEB format so I had to create a Slackware package to install it. Here’s how I went about doing that.
